Welcome! My name is Dzvinka, and I am a junior at Minerva University majoring in Computer Science. I created this website to explain a bit about myself, and to perhaps reveal some aspects of my personality and interests which my social media pages don't show. Please feel free to poke around and read those sections which most interest you, or get in touch with me through my social media links at the bottom of the page. Thank you for your visit!
